column5: Went out fishing for only the second time this year and first time with my brother. Less then ideal conditions for top water bass but this year has been pooched anyway so there wasn’t much to be done. All of my son’s fish were caught on a black plopper and my brothers’s on a white popper.
DANG, the boy is grown like a weed Rob. Nice fish by all.
Ya, he's at that stage where he's growing out of clothes/shoes before he even has a chance to wear them out.
I should of added,he is a hansom fell, takes from his mothers side Im sure. 😄
Great fish, great day on the water👍👍
